channel.title: Run bat. Problem (Minor Please Help)
channel.description:
I havent done work on private servers for a while now and i was wondering if someone could help me fix my run bat error, very basic question but i really need help, below is whats in the run batch i had jdk but need a correct formula to run it. thank you so much !
"@echo off title Kandarin Server 2010 "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause"

item.title: Run bat. Problem (Minor Please Help)
item.dc:creator: @M0R3TANK1NG M0R3TANK1NG
item.description:
@M0R3TANK1NG wrote:

Change:

"@echo off title Kandarin Server 2010 "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause"

to…

"@echo off title Kandarin Server 2010 "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause"

Read full topic

item.title: Run bat. Problem (Minor Please Help)
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“sordsmen123, post:3, topic:477343”]the problem is that when i attempt to run the serverr, it says system cannot find the specified path… i have jre 7… and jdk.[/quote]oh my

sordsmen123:

jre 7

You have Jre7 and trying to run

[quote=“sordsmen123, post:1, topic:477343”]"@echo off
title Kandarin Server 2010
“C:\Program Files\Java[b]\jre6[/b]bin\java.exe” -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause"[/quote]
Please change jre6 to jre7, and I would strongly recommend you using JDK to run a server.

Read full topic

item.title: Run bat. Problem (Minor Please Help)

item.description:
@sordsmen123 wrote:

the problem is that when i attempt to run the serverr, it says system cannot find the specified path… i have jre 7… and jdk.

item.title: Run bat. Problem (Minor Please Help)
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

#1–Can you post the problem please.
#2–It look’s fine…Are you sure you have jre6 in program files/java?
#3–If ^^^^^^^ did not work i suggest you get jre7

Read full topic

item.title: Run bat. Problem (Minor Please Help)
item.dc:creator: @sordsmen123 sordsmen123
item.description:
@sordsmen123 wrote:

I havent done work on private servers for a while now and i was wondering if someone could help me fix my run bat error, very basic question but i really need help, below is whats in the run batch i had jdk but need a correct formula to run it. thank you so much !

“@echo off
title Kandarin Server 2010
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause”
